title: Online fraud doubles crime figures
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Online fraud doubles crime figures There were believed to have been 7.6 million cases of fraud and cybercrime in the year to June Corbis Google+ 1 of 1 There were believed to have been 7.6 million cases of fraud and cybercrime in the year to June Corbis Richard Ford Home Correspondent Published 1 minute ago 
Crime in England and Wales has more than doubled to 14.1 million offences annually, according to the first official estimate to include fraud and cybercrime. Subscribe now
